00079 #define FCPU 11059200ul //!< The frequency of CPU crystal
00080 #define RS 0
00081 #define RW 1
00082 #define EN 2
00083 #define lcd_port PORTC  //!< PORT to which LCD is connected
00084 
00085 #define sbit(reg,bit)   reg |= (1<<bit)                 //!<  to set a certain bit of given register. 
00086 #define cbit(reg,bit)   reg &= ~(1<<bit)                //!<  to reset a certain bit of given register.
00087 
00088 unsigned int temp; 
00089 unsigned int unit; 
00090 unsigned int tens; 
00091 unsigned int hundred; 
00092 unsigned int thousand; 
00093 unsigned int million;

00096 void lcd_reset();
00097 void lcd_init();
00098 void lcd_wr_command(unsigned char);
00099 void lcd_wr_char(char);
00100 void lcd_line1();
00101 void lcd_line2();
00102 void lcd_string(char*);
00103 
00108 void lcd_port_config (void)
00109 {
00110  DDRC = DDRC | 0xF7; //all the LCD pin's direction set as output
00111  PORTC = PORTC & 0x80; // all the LCD pins are set to logic 0 except PORTC 7
00112 }
00113 
00117  void lcd_set_4bit()
00118 {
00119         _delay_ms(1);
00120 
00121         cbit(lcd_port,RS);                              //RS=0 --- Command Input
00122         cbit(lcd_port,RW);                              //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00123         lcd_port = 0x30;                                //Sending 3
00124         sbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Set Enable Pin
00125         _delay_ms(5);                                   //Delay
00126         cbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Clear Enable Pin
00127 
00128         _delay_ms(1);
00129 
00130         cbit(lcd_port,RS);                              //RS=0 --- Command Input
00131         cbit(lcd_port,RW);                              //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00132         lcd_port = 0x30;                                //Sending 3
00133         sbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Set Enable Pin
00134         _delay_ms(5);                                   //Delay
00135         cbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Clear Enable Pin
00136 
00137         _delay_ms(1);
00138 
00139         cbit(lcd_port,RS);                              //RS=0 --- Command Input
00140         cbit(lcd_port,RW);                              //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00141         lcd_port = 0x30;                                //Sending 3
00142         sbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Set Enable Pin
00143         _delay_ms(5);                                   //Delay
00144         cbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Clear Enable Pin
00145 
00146         _delay_ms(1);
00147 
00148         cbit(lcd_port,RS);                              //RS=0 --- Command Input
00149         cbit(lcd_port,RW);                              //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00150         lcd_port = 0x20;                                //Sending 2 to initialise LCD 4-bit mode
00151         sbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Set Enable Pin
00152         _delay_ms(5);                                   //Delay
00153         cbit(lcd_port,EN);                              //Clear Enable Pin
00154 
00155         
00156 }
00157 
00161  void lcd_init()
00162 {
00163         _delay_ms(1);
00164 
00165         lcd_wr_command(0x28);                   //LCD 4-bit mode and 2 lines.
00166         lcd_wr_command(0x01);
00167         lcd_wr_command(0x06);
00168         lcd_wr_command(0x0E);
00169         lcd_wr_command(0x80);
00170                 
00171 }        
00172          
00176  void lcd_wr_command(unsigned char cmd)
00177 {
00178         unsigned char temp;
00179         temp = cmd;
00180         temp = temp & 0xF0;
00181         lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00182         lcd_port |= temp;
00183         cbit(lcd_port,RS);
00184         cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00185         sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00186         _delay_ms(5);
00187         cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00188         
00189         cmd = cmd & 0x0F;
00190         cmd = cmd<<4;
00191         lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00192         lcd_port |= cmd;
00193         cbit(lcd_port,RS);
00194         cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00195         sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00196         _delay_ms(5);
00197         cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00198 }
00199 
00203 void lcd_wr_char(char letter)
00204 {
00205         char temp;
00206         temp = letter;
00207         temp = (temp & 0xF0);
00208         lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00209         lcd_port |= temp;
00210         sbit(lcd_port,RS);
00211         cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00212         sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00213         _delay_ms(5);
00214         cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00215 
00216         letter = letter & 0x0F;
00217         letter = letter<<4;
00218         lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00219         lcd_port |= letter;
00220         sbit(lcd_port,RS);
00221         cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00222         sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00223         _delay_ms(5);
00224         cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00225 }

00227 
00231 void lcd_home()
00232 {
00233         lcd_wr_command(0x80);
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00240 void lcd_string(char *str)
00241 {
00242         while(*str != '\0')
00243         {
00244                 lcd_wr_char(*str);
00245                 str++;
00246         }
00247 }
00248 
00255 void lcd_cursor (char row, char column)
00256 {
00257         switch (row) {
00258                 case 1: lcd_wr_command (0x80 + column - 1); break;
00259                 case 2: lcd_wr_command (0xc0 + column - 1); break;
00260                 case 3: lcd_wr_command (0x94 + column - 1); break;
00261                 case 4: lcd_wr_command (0xd4 + column - 1); break;
00262                 default: break;
00263         }
00264 }
00265 
00274 void lcd_print (char row, char coloumn, unsigned int value, int digits)
00275 {
00276         unsigned char flag=0;
00277         if(row==0||coloumn==0)
00278         {
00279                 lcd_home();
00280         }
00281         else
00282         {
00283                 lcd_cursor(row,coloumn);
00284         }
00285         if(digits==5 || flag==1)
00286         {
00287                 million=value/10000+48;
00288                 lcd_wr_char(million);
00289                 flag=1;
00290         }
00291         if(digits==4 || flag==1)
00292         {
00293                 temp = value/1000;
00294                 thousand = temp%10 + 48;
00295                 lcd_wr_char(thousand);
00296                 flag=1;
00297         }
00298         if(digits==3 || flag==1)
00299         {
00300                 temp = value/100;
00301                 hundred = temp%10 + 48;
00302                 lcd_wr_char(hundred);
00303                 flag=1;
00304         }
00305         if(digits==2 || flag==1)
00306         {
00307                 temp = value/10;
00308                 tens = temp%10 + 48;
00309                 lcd_wr_char(tens);
00310                 flag=1;
00311         }
00312         if(digits==1 || flag==1)
00313         {
00314                 unit = value%10 + 48;
00315                 lcd_wr_char(unit);
00316         }
00317         if(digits>5)
00318         {
00319                 lcd_wr_char('E');
00320         }
00321         
00322 }
